name: youtube-all-html5
description: Play all videos on youtube without flash.
author: Klemens Sch√∂lhorn

preferences.name: yt-player-height
preferences.title: YouTube player size
preferences.description: Automatically change the size of the YouTube player.

preferences.name: yt-video-resolution
preferences.title: YouTube video resolution
preferences.description:
Choose the video quality to load.
"Auto" chooses the right resolution for the size selected above.

preferences.name: yt-disable-spf
preferences.title: Disable YouTube SPF
preferences.description: SPF loads pages through JavaScript, which causes some problems for this add-on

preferences.name: yt-disable-flash
preferences.title: Disable Flash on YouTube
preferences.description: If you want to keep Flash enabled but use HTML5 on YouTube (and embedded videos).

preferences.name: yt-fix-volume
preferences.title: Fix volume bug on YouTube
preferences.description: This sets the volume to 100% on start of the video.

preferences.name: yt-start-paused
preferences.title: Start videos paused on YouTube
preferences.description: This pauses videos when they are loaded

preferences.name: yt-loadtype
preferences.title: YouTube video loading method
preferences.description: Note: The button always uses the API method on first click and the embedding method on second click.
